Deals

Deals & Coupons
===============

**Coupons & Gift Cards**  
– Code: SAMOSACHAT | BOGO [Samosa Chat](https://www.toasttab.com/himalayan-restaurant-niles/)
 (Niles)  
 

**Deals**  
– [Family meal deal for 3 – 4](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/family-speical-meal-deal/)
 Niles-Chicago  
– [Family meal deal for 5 – 6](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/family-speical-meal-deal/)
 Niles-Chicago

Popular Items
=============

[Most popular items of the restaurant](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/popular-items)

slide 1 to 3 of 6

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65700b1ec0171.jpg)

Chicken Biryani
===============

Basmati rice flavored and cooked with Chicken in chef’s special biryani Masala.

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65793e73da434.jpg)

Chicken Tikka Masala
====================

Expert Marinated chicken breast cooked in creamy onion tomato sauce.

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65793eb167c20.jpg)

Sheesh Kebab
============

Minced lamb blended in chef's combination of herbs and spices, roasted in clay oven

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65793f6e6b56d.jpg)

Chicken Momo
============

The momo embodies many cultures into a single entity.

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65793fb21b911.jpg)

Tandoori Prawn
==============

Jumbo prawn roasted in clay oven and cooked in special seasoned sauce.

![](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/storage/menu_item/65793ff970012.jpg)

Samosa Chat
===========

Crispy samosas topped with Tangy and Spicy yogurt and chutney.

**Introducing:**  
[Himalayan Express Lunch](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/himalayan-express-lunch-specials/)
  
[Samosa](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/2020/08/16/himalayan-samosa-chat/)
 [Chaat](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/himalayan-samosa-chaat/)
  
[Shimp Chili](https://himalayanrestaurant.com/shrimp-chilli-seafood/)

Please note: Price listed here are subjected to change without notice. In order to order wine and beer, one must be 21 years or older. Some of the promotions might not be available or expired, please call to confirm.

> _**Easy to order:**_  
> _Call us at 312.877.5999_ [_**Order Himalayan Chicago**_](https://www.toasttab.com/himalayan-restaurant)
>  _| 847-324-4150_ [_**Order Himalayan Niles**_](https://www.toasttab.com/himalayan-restaurant-niles)
